TextView.android:text: • Use a dibble for making holes in ground and dibble seeds at depth of 3-5cm above band where fertilizers are applied. Wet soils helps to boost germination and good establishment of crop. • Sow extra seeds in 150-gauge-thick polyethylene bags filled with FYM and soil in ratio of 1:3 • Extra seedlings can be used to fill gaps in field. Cut open poly bag and plant seedling along with intact soil and then irrigate within 10 days. • Dibbing 2 or 3 seeds at one place makes plants grow weak. So, Thinning should be done within 15 days to make crop economically viable
